text: [Music]
I was excited about coming to business
school for the chance to make an impact
on the world through business and the
lens that really interested me was
sustainability and green business ID
studied economics and environmental
science in college to try and understand
how the Business Systems worked from an
economic standpoint and also understand
enery and the the demand for Renewables
and why sustainability was going to be
so important for our future moving
forward I felt like you know coming to
HBS would be a great way to kind of
bring together some of what I'd studied
and figure out how to put that into
practice if I think about 20 years down
the line I hope that I will be making a
positive difference in the world I think
that there's a big opportunity for
companies that are involved in in
manufacturing at all from the food
industry to uh technology to look at how
they use resources and you know think
about how they can be more efficient in
that consumption and that decreases
their cost but you know also um reduces
the the burden that we're imposing on on
the resources that we have which are are
finite that conversation is is growing
in the US but it's it's definitely still
uh an emerging field and i' I'd love to
have a hand in shape it
